this is the full tankobon translation in progress, not a continuous of the main story. stop complaining for those who don't know how publishing works

Brain: I want main story line 
Dick: it doesn't really matter now does it

For the people who are confused, Megafaggot (lol) is clearly translating the whole volume in order OF THE VOLUME not the specific Mizuha Story arc. The other translator only did the Mizuha story arc and skipped the other volume chapters putting the arc all together in order of the arc not the volume. This is the right order for the volume specifically (check the Japanese version). Anyway the rest of Mizuhas story will come after these few chapters. So hopefully that clears things up so people wont complain every update that this isnt correct.
Really, really hope they make an animation of that first story!!! I loved it

Nothing wrong here man. In here #293575 yo can see the original version (in japanese). This just need the last chapter (or chapters, i don't know japanse, i'm only looking the thumbnails)
